meta.title: Huawei Manager Mobile — Control & Monitor Your Huawei LTE Modem
meta.description: Android app to control and monitor Huawei LTE modems. Supports B310, B311, B312, E5573, E5577 and more. Real-time signal monitoring, WiFi management, SMS, data usage tracking, and parental controls.
meta.ogTitle: Huawei Manager Mobile — Your Modem, Your Control
meta.ogDescription: Free Android app to manage Huawei LTE modems. Monitor signal quality, control WiFi, track data usage, manage SMS, and more.

hero.title:
Your Huawei Modem,
Fully Under Control
hero.description: Monitor signal quality, manage WiFi, track data usage, control connected devices, and more — all from your Android phone.

features.sectionDescription: Everything you need to manage your Huawei LTE modem, right from your phone.

signalMonitor.title: Signal Monitor
signalMonitor.description: Real-time RSRP, RSRQ, RSSI, and SINR monitoring with Signal Finder mode to locate the best signal position.

wifiManagement.title: WiFi Management
wifiManagement.description: View and manage WiFi settings, connected devices, and network configurations easily.

dataUsage.title: Data Usage Tracking
dataUsage.description: Monitor daily and monthly data consumption with visual charts and detailed statistics.

smsManagement.title: SMS Management
smsManagement.description: Read, send, and manage SMS messages through your modem. Supports multi-select delete.

parentalControl.title: Parental Controls
parentalControl.description: Create profiles to block or restrict internet access for specific connected devices.

batteryStatus.title: MiFi Battery Status
batteryStatus.description: Monitor battery level and power status on Huawei MiFi devices that support battery reporting.

darkMode.title: Dark & Light Mode
darkMode.description: Interface that adapts to your system theme preference or toggle manually.

multiLanguage.title: Multi-Language
multiLanguage.description: Full English and Bahasa Indonesia support for all menus, labels, and notifications.

devices.sectionDescription: Compatible with popular Huawei LTE modem series.
devices.testedOn: Tested on Huawei B312-929 (Orbit Star 2) with Android 15
devices.andMore: And other Huawei LTE modems using the standard API

showcase.sectionDescription: Explore the app interface designed for simplicity and power.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Monitor connection speed, data usage, and usage history in a single view.

signalFinder.title: Signal Finder
signalFinder.description: Find the best position for your modem with real-time RSRP and SINR readings.

wifiSettings.title: WiFi Management
wifiSettings.description: Manage network settings and see all connected devices.

download.sectionDescription: Choose the right APK for your device. Free and open source.

arm64.title: ARM64 (64-bit)
arm64.description: Recommended for most Android phones released after 2016.

armv7.title: ARMv7 (32-bit)
armv7.description: For older or low-end 32-bit Android devices. Smaller file size.

universal.title: Universal
universal.description: Contains libraries for all architectures. Use if unsure which version to pick.

installGuide.title: How to Install
steps: Download the APK suitable for your device (ARM64 recommended).
Enable "Install from unknown sources" in Android Settings.
Open the APK file to install.

footer.description: An independent open-source project. Not affiliated with Huawei Technologies.
footer.author: Anggun Caksono

faq.sectionDescription: Quick answers to common questions about Huawei Manager Mobile.

questions.a: Most Huawei LTE modems with standard API support are compatible. This includes the B310, B311, B312 (Modem CPE) or E5573, E5577 (MiFi) series and other Modem/MiFi models. The app has been specifically tested on the Huawei B312-929 (Orbit Star 2).
Yes. If your modem's firmware supports it, the app allows you to select and lock specific frequency bands to improve signal stability or speed.

questions.q: Does the app track data usage accurately?
questions.a: The app fetches data consumption statistics directly from the modem. While highly accurate, we recommend cross-checking with your provider's official dashboard for billing purposes.

questions.q: How does the Signal Finder work?
questions.a: Signal Finder provides real-time RSRP, RSRQ, and SINR readings with visual and audio feedback, making it easier to find the optimal physical placement for your modem.

questions.q: Can I manage SMS through the app?
questions.a: Yes. You can read, send, and even perform multi-select deletion of SMS messages directly from the app interface if your modem supports it.
Absolutely. Your credentials are stored securely on your device and are only used locally to communicate with your modem. No data is ever sent to external servers.
Yes, this app is free and open source. You can download and use it at no cost.

questions.q: Can this app work with the latest Huawei modems?
questions.a: Yes, this app can work with latest Huawei modems. However, please note that not all Huawei modems support all features of this app. Some features may not be available on certain modems.
